home.hero_title: High-End Craftsmanship in Plastering and Painting
home.hero_subtitle: Professional solutions for both individual customers and businesses
home.feature_1_description: With years of experience, our expert team delivers services at the highest standards, aiming for perfection in every detail.
home.feature_2_description: We leave your space spotless upon completion and meticulously protect your furniture and floors during the process.
home.feature_3_description: We choose the industry's best brands and most durable materials for long-lasting and aesthetic results.
home.services_subtitle: Professional Solutions Adding Value to Your Spaces
home.service_paint_desc: We perform interior wall, ceiling, door, and skirting painting processes at high quality standards.
home.service_stuc_desc: We apply smooth plaster for new surfaces and perform correction and renovation for old surfaces.
home.service_prep_desc: The surface is prepared first for a perfect result.
home.service_door_desc: We apply without leaving marks in areas requiring detailed craftsmanship using professional equipment.
home.service_frame_desc: We repair worn door and window frames and repaint them to restore their original appearance.
home.brand_intro_text1: LeoNL is a quality-oriented professional application brand specializing in plastering and painting.
home.brand_intro_text2: Working meticulously at every stage from surface preparation to the final coat, it offers flawless and long-lasting solutions to both individual customers and businesses.
home.brand_intro_text3: For LeoNL, painting is not just an application; it is a combination of detail, discipline, and aesthetic understanding.
home.cta_title: Let's Bring Your Project to Life
home.cta_subtitle: Professional touches for your dream spaces.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Our Story and Mission
about.paragraph1: LeoNL was founded with the vision of adding value to your spaces. We combine aesthetics and durability in professional painting and plastering applications. With our passionate team, we treat every project as our own and work to deliver the best results.
about.paragraph2: Our mission is to bring your living spaces to the look you've dreamed of. With our commitment to innovation, quality, and customer satisfaction, we continue to be a reliable solution partner in the industry.
about.value1_desc: We elevate surface quality to the highest level in every project, aiming for perfection in details.
about.value2_desc: We manage the process professionally from start to finish with our planned, clean, and meticulous work approach.
about.value3_desc: We build lasting trust through transparent communication and the principle of delivery at the promised time.
about.principles_highlight: Preparation is the most important stage of the work for us.

gallery.title: Our Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Our Completed Projects
gallery.description: Take a look at some of our projects that reflect our craftsmanship and quality.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch for a free inspection and quote.
contact.description: As LeoNL, we offer professional plastering and painting solutions throughout the Netherlands. You can contact us for a free inspection and quote.

footer.company_description: LeoNL adds aesthetics and value to your spaces with professional painting and interior renovation services. Quality craftsmanship and customer satisfaction are our priorities.
